title: Luxury goods market worldwide by segment share in 2007 and 2012
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups 2007, and 2012. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Segment share.
In Race Fashion / Apparel, 2007 had the highest Segment share 443.0 among the 2 groups and in Other, 2007 had the lowest Segment share 10.0.
In Race Fashion / Apparel, 2007 had the maximum Segment share and it saw the lowest in Race Other out of all 5 Races.
Race Fashion / Apparel and Other had the biggest gap of 433.0 between the highest and lowest Segment share found for 2007.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Segment share on the Y-axis for 5 different Races for 2 groups 2007, and 2012 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Race Fashion / Apparel, 2007 had the highest Segment share 443.0 among the 2 groups and in Other, 2007 had the lowest Segment share 10.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups 2007, and 2012. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Segment share.
In Race Fashion / Apparel, 2007 had the highest Segment share 443.0 among the 2 groups and in Other, 2007 had the lowest Segment share 10.0.
In Race Fashion / Apparel, 2007 had the maximum Segment share and it saw the lowest in Race Other out of all 5 Races.
Race Fashion / Apparel and Other had the biggest gap of 433.0 between the highest and lowest Segment share found for 2007.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Segment share on the Y-axis for 5 different Races for 2 groups 2007, and 2012 that are presented on the X-axis.
Race Fashion / Apparel had the maximum Segment share among all 2 groups, and it was for 2007. The minimum Segment share was observed in Race Other for 2007.
Among all the Races, 2007 had the highest Segment share in Race Fashion / Apparel and lowest Segment share in Race Other.
There is a gap of 433.0 between the highest and lowest Segment share found for 2007 in Race Fashion / Apparel and Other.
Among the groups, 2007 had the biggest difference in Segment share. Where the maximum Segment share was 44.3 times larger than the minimum Segment share.
On average, the Race Fashion / Apparel had the highest Segment share for all 2 groups 2007, and 2012. Whereas Other had the lowest average Segment share.
